Replies.Reply: Yes I can, our connection is a product of destiny. I have no ill-will against you.
-The Stephen Speilberg film?
Quinn that was war, people do crazy things midst of wide spread conflict. I have gotten jaded over time. It's not like the dark ages when I had style.
Yeah I was such a ham.
Quinn, this is what we do. I have gotten carried away in the past, but now I'm tired. I just want to get this over with.
See at least our obligation would be over.
-centuries-
Atta' boy!
This will do.
Because you dominate me every time-
No, I want you to help me put on a good show. Everyone loves a good climax Quinn.
Where were you last night?
You've done a lot of mopping and thinking over the centuries. It kind of brings me down.
Training.
Now this is a place for a climatic battle.
You will love this.
I went to the toy store last night and picked these up.
Nothing like our real stuff, but it will do.
Come on give it a chance.
You have not been lively at all this go around.
We only do this once every seventy years brother. You have to enjoy it while it lasts.
That's because, I know this is news to you, I represent evil.
Here's the thing though, I'm tired Quinn.
I don't know if we can get off this train. It's just a viscous cycle.
What the hell are you talking about?
You half asleep Quinn?
Look at that ladies and gentleman the apocalypse has begun.
I've seen plenty of movies.
Yeah I watched "The Sorrow and The Pity"
So in all the times we have been here, you haven't gone to the cinema?
Why not?
In your bosses name, what is wrong with you? You've got to enjoy yourself. You might be chosen, but you have needs. We all do.
Can we get back to the matter at hand?
You are a handsome devil.
Weird?
Yes?
What do we have here?
So far you are dead on.
-You know who I am?
Really?
Where are you going with this you weird little man?
How do I do that?
I'm surprised this girl even likes Quinn.
-Make her think he's crazy.
Where have you been?
No I figured you were on your way back-
Who's the girl?
I'm insulted frankly.
No, I'm being serious. You care about the girl, it's obvious. Not in a friendship or I'm curious about human behavior way.
Have you told her?
Quinn you only have a few days left and you care for this girl-
- What's the harm in telling her?
If this is real and you really care for this girl, you have to tell her. It's only fair to her.
Sounds to me like she is right.
Yeah you don't want to lose your nerve.
Of course.
I thought him admitting his true self would break them up-
The fight is pointless.
So what's the next move?
You're right. We do.
I thought coming here would give us some privacy from Quinn.
About?
Strategy?
-I have to hear this.
- Like 12 steps?
Oh I am so all ears.
Excuse me? A battle cry?
And a battle cry is going to give me the advantage in battle?
What?
I'd rather not.
Right here?
So right now?
Excuse me for a second.
I don't trust you anymore.
So is yours.
You fighting tomorrow morning Quinn?
Let me walk away from you first then.
I'm coming at you! You are in this game like it or not!
Hold on sunshine!
What do you think Zoey? I'm a ninja!
That's not nice! I think I look good.
This is going to be fun. You'll see.
Or a foul mouthed Velma. That gets me so hard. Does that get you hard Ryan?
Will you shut up?!? You are ruining my climatic fight.
Showtime.
I'm not going to lose this time.
Lady, it would look weird if we roamed the earth for 5000 years without facing a mortal death! We keep getting reborn, sometimes we even switch physical form.
What?!?
What are you talking about??
What is he talking about?
Yeah sometimes to a fault.
I'm tired of you. I'm going to end it!
It's the endgame.
Go home girl!
I appreciate the faux concern but I'm fine.
With our history can you honestly say you care about my well being?
No, there was that little French girl I liked. You..you violated her and torched her farm killing her family-
When you would rape the horses and ride away on the women?
Louis I might be nervous, but I accept my role as savior of this world.
We have been doing this for years-
-and in 5 days we will do the same thing we have always done.
We'll fight to the death.
So what are you wanting to do?
Why?
So you want me to help you get an advantage?
Is this yours?
No need to apologize.
Do you want to sit?
Quinn.
Zoey? Interesting.
Very unique.
I don't go to Marshall, I live near the campus though.
As in profession? I don't really have one.
Yeah, my father provides for me.
Everything.
To the river?
I just needed to think.
My apologies.
My head disagrees.
It's really OK.
No, I just have some problems.
I'm not sure about my calling in life.
I'd appreciate that. I don't have many friends.
No, it's OK. I agree it never hurts to have a friend.
You really don't have to.
OK.
No quite pleasant.
OK?
Nice meeting both of you.
I like him.
Zoey I would be more than happy to pay.
I can cover dessert at least.
-So you don't want dessert?-
It doesn't bother me.
I don't believe anyone is truly an atheist at the end.
Why's that?
One supports the business they are in I guess.
Kind of.
He's?
You didn't.
What?
You are a very cryptic speaker.
OK?
You are kind of right on that one.
I am looking for help. I'm out with you though because I'm interested in getting to know you.
Kind of.
You like lost souls don't you?
You going to save me?
I think you might be able to.
Dessert.
So what do you need?
Not bad.
What's in the bag?
It's kind of lightweight..and silly.
Louis our whole purpose here, is to show up, and over time establish a social base, and then kill each other.
That's because you find a way to screw it up every time.
That's something we agree on. I'm tired too.
Letting you win is not an option.
It's OK. I like your friends.
Yes?
Sort of.
It's complicated.
It's really OK.
It's OK this will be my first film experience.
Yeah, I've never seen a film before. I mean I know of films, can't live in this world and not. I've just never seen one.
No it's OK. I'm excited.
You are not.
Please play the film.
Nothing really.
Have you ever seen a movie?
Really?
I think they have a pretty good idea.
It's not what we are here to do.
I have to stay focused.
My place isn't very exciting.
Blu Ray?
You know I realized today you are right about that.
It's OK.
No don't be.
I need to get back though.
It's OK. I'll be by tomorrow.
Yes of course.
You've been waiting long?
-because you are spying on me again? So I don't need to tell you where I've been.
Don't you play that game. You are being facetious.
So why are you here?
Who I am? Of course not!
There's a lot of harm in telling her.
Well I better do this now then.
Can you let yourself out?
I need to see Zoey.
I need to talk to you, it's important.
I need to tell you everything. Anna is so right.
I need to come clean. I want you to trust me. I want your friends to trust me.
Last night?
Did you?
Based on how you are acting this morning I have my doubts. That's not what I meant though. You woke up screaming.
I understand if you don't want to talk about it. I'm just concerned.
What is it?
Please?
Who do you think is to blame?
-None of this was your fault.
I love being with you.
I can't renege on my responsibilities with Louis though.
I know you don't understand this. We just need to make the most of our time.
I know you don't understand. I just need to go see Louis today.
I need to go see Louis.
We have a problem.
Ryan Blood!
He's with Louis. They're planning to kill me.
I can't!
You're right.
No I mean you're right. I need to get control of myself. I have a destiny. I need to figure out my next move.
We need to talk.
I know that guy and I don't trust him.
Your new friend is dangerous.
Leave her out of this.
It's over. This whole thing is nuts. I'm walking away.
How do people keep ending up in my room?
I'm not fighting Louis.
I think you might be right. I don't think it's necessary. I think the world will keep turning one way or another. I'm not dependant on that.
I'm not a savior.
Yes. I do believe it. I know it actually.
You're not selfish Zoey.
Let her go!
Where's Zoey?
That actually felt kind of good.
I'll be back guys.
Let her go!
Is this the game you want to play?
There's more going on than you realize Zoey.
You don't get it do you.
I'm going to be honest with you Louis.
We have always played this game as honest as we could. We never did anything to undermine the other. Despite what you represent, you have moral code.
You are not acting with in that code today.
You're losing right now. Your actions, you can't win like this. Not acting this way.
You going to shoot me?
Zoey go home. We need to finish this.
I will always love you. You have to go though.
Goodbye.
See and I don't want it to be-
Of course I would. I just-
A Cameron Crowe romantic comedy.
Us having sex?

What the hell?!? How is it not working?!?
How so?
Rick needed someone stable-

Misunderstood-
Now that's a little off base.
It was his gang name.
Exaggerations-
-Unfair. Because these people need someone who is going to sacrifice their own needs for them.
Who else is going to do it? We're alone in the universe. If we are going to make it through this "crazy world" we need to look out for each other.
First of all you are bitter about the whole Dawkins thing, because you flashed him your tits and got us kicked out-

-Enjoy your delusional life there fence sitter. How about you pray to Thor to hit me with a lighting bolt so I can be removed from this asinine conversation.

-Sounds pornographic.

OK?
I'm Zoey.
Oh, well so what do you do?
That's pretty cool. What's he into?
Yes where we are right now.

No it's OK. I mean I'm over it.
I'm sorry.
So what did you need to think about? I mean if I'm not prying of course.
I know.
So we can maybe go out to dinner if you want?
No I want to.
Good let's meet up tonight. My place, 7pm.
Quinn, is he being rude?
Let's go.
Anna, you going to call the guard dog off?
Don't wait up  Zoey and Quinn leave the apartment as Jack stares daggers.
No not at all. This is on me.
Listen Quinn, I'm an atheist-
-No, I just wanted to get it out of the way. It bothers people, I mean in this state especially.

I'm pretty sure I'm really an atheist.
Because I'm a logical thinker.
I don't mean to offend, I'm guessing you're religious.
Oh my God you are in the ministry.
My father was a "fire and damnation"
It's nothing.
Sorry I don't mean to rock your world.
You poor thing. You are probably so desperate for friends-
Have you thought about St John's Wort?
Well you are latching on to religion to make you feel whole. It doesn't make you feel whole, or at least as whole as you thought it would-
See I'm good at reading people.
I don't know Quinn you seem like a lost soul. I thought that when I saw you by the river.
Yeah I actually do. Someone needs to save them.
If you let me.
So what do you need Quinn?
He seems harmless.
I know. He's in the ministry-
I know and he's understanding of that.
It was understood.
You guys leaving?
Will you guys stop??
Will you guys leave??
Bye guys!
Sorry about that.
Tonight's Feature Presentation is "I am Curious:Yellow". Probably not the best date movie, but I always show this to ever guy in the beginning.
What??
This might be a little hard-core for your first film.
I feel like I'm stealing your virginity here.
You're a virgin too aren't you?
Oh my god! I'm a bad girl.
OK? I mean I usually play this for potential boyfriends. If they can handle this, they can handle me.
I guess you're lucky I thought about "They Call Her One Eye".
I hope this doesn't jack you up.
Why haven't I seen your place?
That doesn't surprise me. I can't imagine you having a vast Blu Ray collection.
So you're saying you want to come up stairs and watch "They Call Her One Eye"?
I shouldn't have been that aggressive.
OK?
You sure?
I hope so.
What's going on??
Quinn? What's wrong?
What are you talking about? Anna is right?
OK?
OK Quinn, just spit it out.
You must have a brain tumor or something.
Shhh. You need me more than ever.
Yes?
Enjoy myself? Of course.
It was nothing.
You don't want to hear about it.
Me too.
You're not actually going to fight your friend to the death are you?
Quinn, in 2 days things are going to be normal. This is just a delusion.
I understand that.
What is it?
What was wrong?
What are you talking about?
I haven't heard from Quinn since he wigged out today.
He needs me.
This isn't about me and you-
What fucking file?
So is the file folder for dramatic effect?
Quinn?
You mentioned that earlier. What is going on?
I thought that was the whole plan.
Why don't you come over here.
Come on Quinn get a grip. Just calm down and come over here.
OK so just come on over and we'll talk.
Quinn? No wait-
I don't know. He's losing it.
So what is all this?
You're not telling me anything I didn't already know.
I'm too far into this now. I don't have a choice.
Let me be guys.
What's this?
Quinn's roommate was Ryan Blood?
Ah fuck.
Excuse me?
I'm looking for Mrs. Rhodes. I believe the people here referred to her as "mother".
I'm sure they do.
You guys shutting down?
Is there something wrong with you?
What? I don't know what that means.
What?
What a fucking nut house!
What!
And?
Wait Louis? You think Louis made Quinn appear crazy?
There is more to it than that.
Listen "Robot Boy", where did this whole belief come from? This isn't something two kids come up with on their own.
Exactly. I heard there was an employee that got fired for sharing Mormon mythology with the boys.
How?
-How is that different than a dream? Just saying-
So she had Quinn committed?
Fucking Ryan Blood!
Thanks Jack.
I'm going to stop an Apocalyptic battle.
You need to learn to lock up.
Why the change of heart?
Do you really believe? You know?
I care about you Quinn. That's sincerely my reason for wanting to do this. That's a first for me you know?
I'm not doing it anymore. You will not have redemption from me.
Take ownership of what you did. Don't rely on me to save you. I need to start saving myself.
Goodbye.
You're fucking crazy!
I think you're a fucking nut bag.
Mrs Rhodes? Does that name ring a bell?
Go fuck yourself.
Mrs. Rhodes? What about her? Other than she fucked you guys up. She taught you, Louis how to play it straight. Then she has you fuck Quinn over.
Yeah by getting him in contact with you.
Is that why she placed you in that hospital?
Guys I have let my parents fuck me up.
I thought you didn't believe this shit anymore.
This is fucked. Quinn you're not 5000 years old. You were born in an orphanage.
That makes total fucking sense. Color me stupid!
What the fuck!
No you don't. Guys what are you doing?
Are you being serious?
If you don't walk away from this field right now, you will lose me. I will not be in your corner. I will call for help.
For years we have thought absence of the impossible indicated that we were exercising free thought. In my experience ladies and gentleman, that's not the case.
Believing in hope my friends, opening yourself up to accepting there might be more than the world around you. That's truly being a free thinker.
I've tried to pass it on to you.
Just remember, you can believe what you want to believe Jennifer. Live by what ever moral code you want to live by. Just make sure it's yours. Don't let it stem from anger or past tragedies.
Let it come from your heart.
What is it?
Likewise.
I didn't catch your name.
Yeah I'm fine.
Enjoy dinner.
Likewise.
Wouldn't there be more people here if it was an intervention?
Nope.
-it's my lifeline-
-I'm not a project, you know that right?
-Take it upon yourself to save people.
People could just save themselves.
So our relationship is like a romantic comedy?
Check that out Lloyd Dobler.
I love the part coming up.
You know where I put your legs behind your head and yell "hump bunny!"
-Yeah not working any more for me-
This part is fucking priceless.
Zoey sits on a bench beside her best friend ANNA. Zoey is completely distant, as Anna's words pass through her into thin air.
You know I don't like interjecting myself into other people's affairs but-
You let Rick do this to you.
You think you can change the men you are with. You can't get into a relationship with someone in the hopes that you can mold them into the person you want them to be.
-Rick needs castrated.
He was an asshole.
You have been repeating the same cycle your whole entire life.
Remember Billy, who used to give kids the "dirty bomb"? You took it upon yourself to change this behavior-
Of course.
We won't talk about prom night. Needless to say it wasn't romantic.
Why?
I think you use atheism and the whole "we are alone in the universe" jive to justify your actions.
I regret taking you to see Dawkins because you use that as a fall back to be codependent.
-You didn't even know the first thing about "The God Delusion" until I gave you a copy-
-Enjoy your suite in hell non-believer-
You're hiding behind this religious debate because you don't want to admit you have always gravitated toward the "wrong type" of guy.
What are you staring at?
The one closest to us is Quinn. Very weird, socially awkward type of guy. I don't know who his friend is.
I don't know. Looks like that stuff my ex-
Oh no you don't! This is exactly what I was talking about!
Wait a second? You've already established contact with Quinn?
You have your sights on him already!
What happened?
I promised her we would behave.
This is why I don't need a boyfriend. You are way to good to me.
David Smith's Candytakers is on tonight.
I don't know, he seems fishy.
I have heard that a million times.
-and you hate organized religion.
Plus it's to my understanding he didn't actually admit what he did. He just did a bunch of double talk.
So Quinn?
Zoey says you are in the ministry?
You are or you aren't.
At some point you will have to explain it to Zoey. I mean don't you agree?
"Date Rape"

I became a "fag hag"
What the hell?
What about tomorrow? Or never is good.
Jesus Christ!
What are you doing?
Well honestly maybe that's a good thing.
He doesn't need you! Not everyone needs you!
-This is about me and you! You think you can make up for what happened. The fact you didn't notice, couldn't save me in time. You were a child! I was a child!
Hate me all you want, but it's impossible to redeem yourself for things you had no control over.
That makes it worse. You're going to continue this now that you know for a fact that he is nuts?
So where is she at now?
Her Christ Complex is going to get her killed.
ZOEY 10 YEARS OLD  A young BOY is sitting on another little boy's head. It looks like he is passing gas on him.
Zoey is overcome with emotion as she makes her way down to the riverside. She is holding something tight in her hand.
As her hand opens a class ring was digging into her palm.
Still teary eyed, Zoey angrily throws the ring toward the river. A gust of wind causes the ring to curve and it slams into the temple of a man sitting on a park bench.
Quinn jolts up. Zoey is alarmed.
So when does Ted Bundy get here?
You sit your pretty little ass down hooker.
Look at this mother fucker.
Zoey is in the bathroom getting ready for a night of manipulation, sit the fuck down.
I will call the state police in a fucking heart beat if she isn't here by midnight.
Get the fuck out.
Yeah we don't want to interrupt your "date rape".
Who is going too far now?
You know I hate him because it's my nature but-
What the fuck?!? I want to watch Bring me the Head of Alfredo Garcia in peace!
Just show her the fucking file.
What is it?
You need to look at this.
I spent a lot of time gathering that information.
Quinn Wilson and Louis Marks were orphans.

Quinn displayed some erratic behavior from the beginning. One of the staff members was Mormon and they would read stories to Quinn out of the Book Of Mormon. That employee was later fired, but a seed was planted in Quinn's head.
Why don't you let us save you? Please Zoey.
Looks like a room list from the psych hospital.
Quinn and his roommate is listed.
You might be right sweetheart. The employee I was telling you about earlier was instrumental in getting Appleridge Orphanage shut down.
Mrs. Rhodes was pretty well known in Huntington. I think she felt this guy was getting in the way of her master plan.
That girl you talked to was "pants crapping nuts". She actually makes your boyfriend look sane. I guess she believes that Lucifer came to her in a vision-
-I don't know. I think you have to be awake for a vision.
To the same hospital where her nephew was a patient. All on the dark lord's orders I guess.
Your friends are fucking whack.
So what are you going to do?
Goddamn Zoey!
I got a text about thirty minutes ago.
What?
Trust me I know Anna.
Maybe it's Quinn the jackass.
Mother fucker!
Fuck you mother fucker! I'm going to call the fucking fuzz once you untie me!
Ass fuck salad-
A foot is seen kicking the bed, startling Quinn.
From behind a tree we see RYAN BLOOD for the first time.
Quinn looks behind the tree, but Ryan is long gone. Zoey comes up from behind, she places her hand on Quinn's shoulder.
Louis spins around and grabs his keys off of the coffee table. He then dances right out the door.
You looking for Quinn?
He just left.
You're here to learn more about his "coming and goings". To find out what I have seen.
It's more than that Louis-
Oh yes.
You battled as mortals-
-You were a Lamanite then-
-Quinn was a commander of the Nephites, last survivor of that nation-
-See after the death of Christ there was some debate on what was going to bring on the end and signal his return-

- It was decided two great warriors had to fight. The winner would determine the start of the apocalypse. Your boss of course needed someone to represent his interests. Who better than Quinn's old adversary?

-His little plan didn't work, but the book is a great coffee table discussion piece. This made him weak Louis. You could have destroyed him. The problem is you've allowed yourself to become fond of him. YOU need to embrace your destiny.
This girl is distracting him. Get his mind focused on the matter at hand. At this point I'm afraid he isn't even going to fight you.
Maybe that's the key-
-Instead he is still hot and heavy with her.
He even did the "bipty boom" last night.
It's not pointless. The game has just changed is all.
We have two levels here: one is making sure we keep him engaged.
Honestly though that's an afterthought at this point-
I think it worked out perfectly.
We need to talk.
Strategy.
Yes. I have a method-
A 12 point system-
Exactly. It's a sure fire plan to throw Quinn off of his game  Louis laughs.
Well the first thing you need is a battle cry.
Yes a battle cry. Every great warrior has one.
Of course it will. Why don't you try one out?
Yeah, try one out right now. It's liberating.
Come on.
Here I'll go first-
See?
Your turn.
Of course.
Oh come on! That sounds like you are scared of the battle. What? Are you scared of Quinn? You probably are-
That's good! Come on!
Yes that's what I'm talking about!
Quinn?!? Good to see you!
Good afternoon boys and girls! I need your assistance.
Let me pretty the girl up a bit  Ryan beats her repeatedly with the gun until she passes out cold from the trauma.
My aunt?
Can we go back to my aunt please?
She didn't fuck Quinn over. She just helped him out.
She knew one day it was all going to catch up with her. She trained me to get into the game. She told me it was my destiny.
She was my caretaker. She told me she was sending me someone. Someone I would have to guide on to the right path.
There is a much bigger purpose. You'll see.
He's pitting us against each other.
Meanwhile, leaning against the dumpster, Louis watches the display unseen.
I want to spend that time with you.
FLASHBACK-ZOEY'S HOME-YEARS EARLIER-DAY  Zoey, roughly 2 years old, sits in the floor of her parent's home playing.
You're not even helping me!
I can't run my congregation with this sickness!
You're too busy running around doing whatever you feel like. I'm going to fall apart and it's all on you.
I don't even know what you want!
The sickness is in your head.
Yes.
People look for a lot of things.
We are ceasing operations.
Excuse me!
I know the young boys you speak of.
I was here when Quinn got sent to the mental hospital. It was like the other one set it up.
They both believed the same thing. Louis was just smart enough to hide it.
Yes I believe a seed was planted.
No. Off base. He's not the right one.
Quinn lowers his katana, it brushes against the blades of grass. Louis follows suit as he slowly walks to meet Quinn in the middle.
CLOSE SHOT- ZOEY'S FACE  Ryan slaps Zoey in the face to wake her up.
Quinn looks over and sees Zoey.
She starts to dial 911. Her thumb moves in the position to hit send.
Zoey stops. She slowly puts her phone away. She looks back toward where the battle is going on.
When she gets to the field Quinn and Louis are gone. All that can be seen is Ryan Blood's body, two katanas and an empty ninja suit.
Hey Grandma.
You look solemn.
What are you thinking about?
You do have a lot of wisdom.
You've taught me a lot.
My new boyfriend. The one I wanted you to meet.
We better get going. We're going to grab something to eat.
He can be like that.
You OK?
See you later on.
Nice to meet to ma'am.
I'm so sorry. I'm being rude.
I'm Louis.
Nice to meet you.
